properties.name: USUMU_SECRET
properties.description: Global secret for encrypting data stored on object storage backends.

properties.name: USUMU_S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID
properties.description: The access key for the S3 backend.

properties.name: USUMU_S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
properties.description: The secret access key for the S3 backend.

properties.name: USUMU_S3_REGION
properties.description: The region for the S3 backend.

properties.name: USUMU_S3_BUCKET
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket to store data in.

properties.name: USUMU_S3_BUCKET_HOST
properties.description: The bucket host string to use for accessing S3 buckets. Must contain %s for the region placeholder.
